Title: Turn Table Turn
Writer: Jenji Kohan (created by), Sara Hess, Jordan Harrison (story editor), Piper Kerman (based on the book by)
Actors: Taylor Schilling, Natasha Lyonne, Uzo Aduba, Danielle Brooks
Plot: Ramos and Flores figure out ways to rebel against authority. A news item has an unexpected effect. Red and Lorna face personal disappointment.
